Desc.entry: Hi 5s is a youth club provision for local young people with disabilities aged 13-25 years. Provides a varied programme of activities which the members plan themselves including outings, sports, crafts, cooking and games. Provides a volunteering opportunity for local able bodied young people aged 13-19 years for them to gain new experiences and take on new challenges. Offers work placements for College and University students. Located in Hackenthorpe so the majority of our members are from the South East Community Assembly.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon & Fri 9.30am-2.30pm (office hours); Thurs 6.30-9pm (youth club, term-time only)
